examples: As soon as we arrived on the island we were eager to explore.
Tan pronto como llegamos a la isla, estábamos ansiosos por explorar.
They explored the land to the south of the Murray River.
Exploraron la tierra al sur del río Murray.
The city is best explored on foot.
La ciudad se explora mejor a pie.
Westerners did not set out to explore the world until the fifteenth century.
Los occidentales no se propusieron explorar el mundo hasta el siglo XV.
